overview:
Paula Berger is VP Marketing and Communication at Sequent Software, an NFC software and services platform provider. She also serves as Chair of the NFC Cluster Boston, a program of the MIT Enterprise Forum that supports the development, adoption and commercial success of Near Field Communication (NFC).

Before joining Sequent, Paula was Executive Director of the NFC Forum for six years, from the associationâ€™s launch through the rollout of the certification program. Paula has extensive experience in communication, as a consultant, a trainer, and as principal and founder of SOLUTIONS, Inc.
